title: How could anyone rate this above 1 star?!?
review: Mostly boring with an absolutely stupid reveal. Nothing remotely scary in any way. Was this just hyped by friends and family of those involved? I know a lot of people who saw this movie and none of them thought it was good....

title: Slow, bad, and nonsensical
review: The demons/creatures could break down trees, but not enter houses....they had followers, but didn't work with them to take down the living. The premise was beyond stupid. Good acting though, for whatever it's worth.
